meaningMnemonic:
<kanji>Change</kanji> and <kanji>change</kanji> equals even more <vocabulary>change</vocabulary>.

変化 generally refers to a natural or spontaneous change, like changes from growth or aging, alterations in weather conditions, or shifts in one's emotions.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
